General.Name: Tianjin Motimo Membrane Tech
General.Description: Tianjin MOTIMO Membrane Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of ultra- and micro filtration membranes, membrane modules, and membrane equipment. The company also provides membrane replacement, membrane engineering, and sewage treatment operation and technical services, as well as membrane system integration solutions. In addition, it offers technical support and after-sales service. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Tianjin, the People's Republic of China.
